pages.text: Increases the duration of spell effects by 15%. Affects:$(li)Path of Redemption$(li)Path of the Aegis$()

pages.mod_text: The spells from your scepter persist longer. Imbues onto the Enduring Scepter or the Scepter of the Paladin. Persists on the Path of Redemption or the Path of the Aegis.
